label: uncl5273
comment: Code specifying the basis for a duty or tax or fee rate.

values.label: Value
values.comment: (5316) To specify that the applicable rate of duty, tax or fee is based on the Customs value (CCC).

values.label: Weight
values.comment: To specify that the applicable rate of duty, tax or fee is based on the weight of the item (CCC).

values.label: Quantity
values.comment: (6060) To specify that the applicable rate of duty, tax or fee is based on the quantity of the item (CCC).
